verses.verse: חָ֭כְמוֹת <S%H2454><s%> Cha-che-mot Wisdom בָּנְתָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> ba-ne-Tah hath builded בֵיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> vei-Tah; her house חָצְבָ֖ה <S%H2672><s%> cha-tze-Vah she hath hewn out עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-Dei-ha pillars שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah. her seven

טָבְחָ֣ה <S%H2873><s%> ta-ve-Chah She hath killed טִ֭בְחָהּ <S%H2874><s%> Tiv-chah her beasts מָסְכָ֣ה <S%H4537><s%> ma-se-Chah she hath mingled יֵינָ֑הּ <S%H3196><s%> yei-Nah; her wine אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> 'Af, has also עָֽרְכָ֥ה <S%H6186><s%> 'a-re-Chah she hath also furnished שֻׁלְחָנָֽהּ׃ <S%H7979><s%> shul-cha-Nah. her table

שָֽׁלְחָ֣ה <S%H7971><s%> sha-le-Chah She hath sent forth נַעֲרֹתֶ֣יהָ <S%H5291><s%> na-'a-ro-Tei-ha her maidens תִקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> tik-Ra; she crieth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- From גַּ֝פֵּ֗י <S%H1610><s%> gap-Pei, upon מְרֹ֣מֵי <S%H4791><s%> me-Ro-mei the highest places קָֽרֶת׃ <S%H7176><s%> Ka-ret. of the city

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Whoever פֶ֭תִי <S%H6612><s%> Fe-ti Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> ya-Sur let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah; here חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> cha-sar- hither [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, understanding אָ֣מְרָה <S%H559><s%> 'A-me-rah she saith לּֽוֹ׃ lo.

לְ֭כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Le-chu Come לַחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> la-cha-Mu eat בְֽלַחֲמִ֑י <S%H3899><s%> ve-la-cha-Mi; of my bread וּ֝שְׁת֗וּ <S%H8354><s%> u-she-Tu, and drink בְּיַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> be-Ya-yin of the wine מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ <S%H4537><s%> ma-Sa-che-ti. [which] I have mingled

עִזְב֣וּ <S%H5800><s%> 'iz-Vu Forsake פְתָאיִ֣ם <S%H6612><s%> fe-ta-Yim the foolish וִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> vich-Yu; and live וְ֝אִשְׁר֗וּ <S%H833><s%> ve-'ish-Ru, and go בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech in the way בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> bi-Nah. of understanding

יֹ֤סֵ֨ר׀ <S%H3256><s%> yo-Ser He that reproveth לֵ֗ץ <S%H3887><s%> Letz, a scorner לֹקֵ֣חַֽ <S%H3947><s%> lo-Ke-ach getteth ל֣וֹ lo קָל֑וֹן <S%H7036><s%> ka-Lon; to himself shame וּמוֹכִ֖יחַ <S%H3198><s%> u-mo-Chi-ach and he that rebuketh לְרָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> le-ra-Sha' a wicked מוּמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3971><s%> mu-Mo. [man getteth] himself a blot

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תּ֣וֹכַח <S%H3198><s%> To-chach Reprove לֵ֭ץ <S%H3887><s%> letz not a scorner פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or יִשְׂנָאֶ֑ךָּ <S%H8130><s%> yis-na-'E-ka; lest he hate הוֹכַ֥ח <S%H3198><s%> ho-Chach thee rebuke לְ֝חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> le-cha-Cham, a wise man וְיֶאֱהָבֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H157><s%> ve-ye-'e-ha-Ve-ka. and he will love

תֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ten Give לְ֭חָכָם <S%H2450><s%> Le-cha-chom [instruction] to a wise וְיֶחְכַּם־ <S%H2449><s%> ve-yech-kam- [man] and he will be yet wiser ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; will be still הוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> ho-Da' teach לְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> le-tzad-Dik, a just וְי֣וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> ve-Yo-sef [man] and he will increase לֶֽקַח׃ <S%H3948><s%> Le-kach. in learning פ Peh

תְּחִלַּ֣ת <S%H8462><s%> te-chil-Lat [is] the beginning חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah of wisdom יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> yir-'At The fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God וְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> ve-Da-'at and the knowledge קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim of the holy בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> bi-Nah. [is] understanding

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בִ֭י vi יִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> yir-Bu shall be multiplied יָמֶ֑יךָ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mei-cha; For by me thy days וְיוֹסִ֥יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> ve-yo-Si-fu shall be increased לְּ֝ךָ֗ le-cha, שְׁנ֣וֹת <S%H8141><s%> she-Not and the years חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim. of thy life

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If חָ֭כַמְתָּ <S%H2449><s%> Cha-cham-ta If thou be wise חָכַ֣מְתָּ <S%H2449><s%> cha-Cham-ta thou shalt be wise לָּ֑ךְ Lach; וְ֝לַ֗צְתָּ <S%H3887><s%> ve-Latz-ta, for thyself but [if] thou scornest לְֽבַדְּךָ֥ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-de-Cha alone תִשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> tis-Sa. thou alone shalt bear

אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet woman כְּ֭סִילוּת <S%H3687><s%> Ke-si-lut A foolish הֹֽמִיָּ֑ה <S%H1993><s%> ho-mi-Yah; [is] clamorous פְּ֝תַיּ֗וּת <S%H6615><s%> pe-tai-Yut, [she is] simple וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> u-val- and יָ֥דְעָה <S%H3045><s%> Ya-de-'ah knoweth מָּֽה׃ <S%H4100><s%> Mah. nothing

וְֽ֭יָשְׁבָה <S%H3427><s%> Ve-ya-she-vah For she sitteth לְפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> le-Fe-tach at the door בֵּיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Tah; of her house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כִּ֝סֵּ֗א <S%H3678><s%> kis-Se, on a seat מְרֹ֣מֵי <S%H4791><s%> me-Ro-mei in the high places קָֽרֶת׃ <S%H7176><s%> Ka-ret. of the city

לִקְרֹ֥א <S%H7121><s%> lik-Ro To call לְעֹֽבְרֵי־ <S%H5674><s%> le-'oe-rei- pass דָ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> Da-rech; Who הַֽ֝מְיַשְּׁרִ֗ים <S%H3474><s%> ham-yash-she-Rim, who go right אֹֽרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H734><s%> O-re-cho-Tam. on their ways

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Whoever פֶ֭תִי <S%H6612><s%> Fe-ti Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> ya-Sur let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah; here וַחֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> va-cha-sar- hither and [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, understanding וְאָ֣מְרָה <S%H559><s%> ve-'A-me-rah she saith לּֽוֹ׃ lo.

מַֽיִם־ <S%H4325><s%> ma-yim- waters גְּנוּבִ֥ים <S%H1589><s%> ge-nu-Vim Stolen יִמְתָּ֑קוּ <S%H4985><s%> yim-Ta-ku; are sweet וְלֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> ve-Le-chem and bread סְתָרִ֣ים <S%H5643><s%> se-ta-Rim [eaten] in secret יִנְעָֽם׃ <S%H5276><s%> yin-'Am. is pleasant

וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- does not יָ֭דַע <S%H3045><s%> Ya-da' But he knoweth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that רְפָאִ֣ים <S%H7496><s%> re-fa-'Im not that the dead שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; are there בְּעִמְקֵ֖י <S%H6012><s%> be-'im-Kei [are] in the depths שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> she-'ol of hell קְרֻאֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H7121><s%> ke-ru-'Ei-ha. [are] there [and that] her guests פ Peh
